thread.title: Straggler Alert: Met Extends Hours for Michelangelo’s Final Day

author: Charles Passy
title: Straggler Alert: Met Extends Hours for Michelangelo’s Final Day
text:
Art lovers can be procrastinators. Art museums know this.
That is why the city’s most prominent art institutions often extend their hours on the day a major exhibition ends its run to accommodate crowds streaming in at the last minute.
In the latest example, the Metropolitan Museum of Art’s main Fifth Avenue location will be staying open until... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
